item.name: Locations
item.description: These endpoints let you create and manage locations.

description.content: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

fabric **Locations** API provides location endpoints that support multi-tenant services. This location data is utilized for both inventory management and order management. When an order is created, it is allocated to the nearest location according to the Order Fulfillment Logic.

Contact Support:
 Name: fabric Orders team
 Email: support@fabric.inc
